newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portuguese bonds slip, jitters over French polls.
newsitem.headline: Portuguese bonds slip, jitters over French polls.

text.p: Portuguese bond futures and cash ended weaker amid concerns over the outcome of French elections on Sunday and the row between the Bundesbank and the Bonn government over official reserves, dealers said.
"The June future ended below 108.50, which was a very important support level," a technical analyst said. "If this is broken, the next strong support level is between 107.25 and 107.50."
